title: Stoa / Nik Bartsch's Ronin
description: ECM debut of a unique young Swiss band led by pianist/composer Nik Bartsch. STOA features intelligent, excitingly propulsive music built on grooves and interlocking rhythms, played by an energetic band with enormous verve and flair.
